name: Adolescent Santa Claus
description: This visual novel game tells the tale of a cute little Santa Clause appearing
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP or higher Processor: Intel Pentium 3 or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® XP or higher Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64MB or greater graphics card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound
